column4: Hey - I'm having an odd problem, I am installing ubuntu on an older computer that doesn't support cd booting, so I threw the hdd from it into a new computer and installed ubuntu on it with the GRUB loader, however, when I put the hdd back in the old computer and boot, grub returned "Cannot mount selected filesystem" or something similar - why?
grub's working with the partition and drive set up from the other machine
